thread.title: What if the hard life of a Georgia fan was filmed as a nature documentary?
thread.title_full: What if the hard life of a Georgia fan was filmed as a nature documentary?

author: Robert Clay | rclay@al.com
title: What if the hard life of a Georgia fan was filmed as a nature documentary?
text:
comments What if the hard life of a Georgia fan was filmed as a nature documentary? Comments 
Fans of the Georgia Bulldogs found themselves in familiar territory after the conclusion of Saturday's 38-10 defeat to Alabama. An early season loss on the national stage sets the Bulldogs on yet another uphill climb to regain a spot in the College Football Playoff discussion. 
It got the SEC Shorts crew at AL.com Studios thinking about just what makes Georgia fans tick. One BBC Natural World styled documentary later, and they think they've found an answer. 
Find out in the latest installment of SEC Shorts by AL.com Studios. 
SEC Shorts, created by Robert Clay and Josh Snead, is a weekly sketch comedy segment offering a look at the lighter side of fan culture and storylines surrounding SEC sports. Follow them on Twitter @roberttheclay and @josnead
